surfaces.ISurface

surfaces   
 

Uses of ISurface in sceneObjects
 

Fields in sceneObjects declared as ISurface
private  ISurface SceneObject.surface
           
 

Methods in sceneObjects that return ISurface
 ISurface SceneObject.getSurface()
          Returns the surface of the object.
 ISurface ISceneObject.getSurface()
          Returns the surface of the object.
 

Methods in sceneObjects with parameters of type ISurface
 void SceneObject.setSurface(ISurface surface)
          Sets the surface of the object (i.e Flat surface).
 void ISceneObject.setSurface(ISurface surface)
          Sets the surface of the object (i.e Flat surface).
 

Uses of ISurface in surfaces
 

Classes in surfaces that implement ISurface
 class AbstractSurface
          This abstract class holds all the shared functionality for all surfaces.
 class CheckersSurface
          This class represents the checkers pattern surface.
 class FlatSurface
          This class represents the flat surface.
 class TextureSurface
          This class represents the texture surface.
